infos.value: Welcome, Lord Mont. I shall teach you the basics of combat.
This time, we will discuss <color=#0000ff>attack types</color>.
Slash, Pierce, Strike, Missile, and Magic. Attacks can be <color=#0000ff>categorized</color> into one of these five attack types.
Furthermore, every unit has an <color=#0000ff>attack type resistance</color>.
You can confirm attack type resistances by tapping the <color=#0000ff>Magnifying Glass</color> icon.
Since your <color=#0000ff>sword slashes</color>, Lord Mont, you should target enemies that have <color=#0000ff>low slash resistance</color>.
Meanwhile, my <color=#0000ff>spear pierces</color>, so I shall take aim at enemies with <color=#0000ff>low pierce resistance</color>.
With that said, shall we depart?
Splendid, we were able to defeat the enemy. Could you sense the difference in damage dealt due to resistances?

Once you become accustomed, you may well learn how to predict the resistances of enemies in battle to some extent by paying attention to <color=#0000ff>their HP gauge</color>, even without tapping the Magnifying Glass icon.
It is always beneficial to be cautious of attack types and their resistances.
